website_summaries.verdict: A premium freeze-dried dog food with a recipe that's jam-packed with high-quality meat and enriched with healthy organic veggies for balanced nutrition.
pros: Containing 90% meat, organs, and bone for a protein-rich meal
Certified organic fruits and vegetables provide essential vitamins, minerals, and fiber
Made in small batches for superior quality control
Complete nutrition for all life stages
Many fussy eaters find it irresistible
cons: Crumbles easily and some batches may break up during shipping
Higher protein and fat content may not agree with all dogs

customer_reviews.title: Sharp bone pieces in every patty
customer_reviews.text: I've been buying Duck Duck Goose for the past 2 years from my local pet food store and everything's been great, but the batch I just purchased through Amazon contains sharp bone bits in nearly every patty. I have a small dog (16 lbs) and these 0.5-1.0cm bone shards seem very dangerous for her small throat. It seems like Stella & Chewy's is either using a new supplier or they switched machinery to prepare this food, since bones are no longer getting fully ground.
customer_reviews.author: JGW

customer_reviews.title: Plastic inside the patty?
customer_reviews.text: We use these as treats, not for meals. Love that we can break them into smaller pieces and give as much or as little as we like. Our dog loves them, so I'm sorry to be yet one more report of foreign objects in the patties . . . we have not seen any bone shards as of yet, as some others have found, but we did just notice what appears to be green plastic embedded in one of the patties (see pictures). It's a great product, so I hope that the manufacturer gets on top of their quality control issues.
customer_reviews.author: Manifest

customer_reviews.title: Spoiled product
customer_reviews.text: My two dogs have been enjoying these patties crumbled on their dry dog food for months. Always scarfed their meals happily. However, this last bag must have been spoiled. Both of my dogs refused to eat their food, and one began throwing up. After trial and error I’ve realized it was these patties. So disappointed. Not sure if this is a Stella & Chewy’s issue or an Amazon issue, but I won’t be purchasing this product again. :(
customer_reviews.author: AH Mom

customer_reviews.title: Expected patties, received a bag of "sawdust".
customer_reviews.text: It's a great product if you buy it in the store but unfortunately this arrived crumbled to smithereens. Essentially received a bag of "sawdust" with not a single formed patty in the bag. I guess we'll be using this as a food topper instead of feeding as treats as we had hoped. Won't be buying this product from Amazon again as it doesn't appear to hold up well to shipping. Edit: Our dog, who usually loves these, completely refuses to eat this batch. Exp. date 8/17, which is much less fresh than those we usually purchase at our local pet store. They're more expensive there, but I guess you get what you pay for. Lesson learned.
customer_reviews.author: A. Noni MouseTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality.
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed. After buying this product for many year I found green plastic and what look like bone fragments in it. They were hard as a rock. It was only after my dog threw up that inspected this batch.
customer_reviews.author: Hellosunshine27

customer_reviews.title: Greedy manufacturer! They call it "changed the bag graphics" ...
customer_reviews.text: Greedy manufacturer! They call it "changed the bag graphics" and together with graphics they changed the product weight - instead of 15 oz now its 14 oz. The expensive dog food became even more expensive. Shame on you! For me it is a big deal as I feed 70 lbs English Bulldog with it. Unfortunately, my Oxford loves this food and I am forced to support this brand.
customer_reviews.author: TigerMom

customer_reviews.title: New Manufacturing Process is Not Good
customer_reviews.text: We received new bags of Stella and Chewy's Super Beef in July. When I opened the new bags, the patties looked different. I was concerned with bad food, so I called Stella and Chewy's to confirm the new patties were safe. I received a call back and they are safe. S&C changed their manufacturing process, not the recipe, so that the patties were firmer. 3 weeks later, our sweet dog is still not able to digest the new patties. After several years of feeding our dog S&C Super Beef being perfect for our food sensitive dog, I guess I am going to have start making her food from scratch.
customer_reviews.author: E. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Changed weight; same price
customer_reviews.text: My dogs love this food so we continued to buy it despite being so expensive. I was really disheartened to see the last package (“new packaging”) is 14oz instead of the regular 15oz yet the same price. Maybe it is time to find an alternative.
customer_reviews.author: KitB22

customer_reviews.title: Made my dog have bloody stool
customer_reviews.text: A few months back my friend introduced these to me. I fed them to my dog a few times without issue. Decided to buy a whole bag and gave one to my dog with his meal. It made him have the runs every 60-90 minutes -- my dog was waking me up constantly in the night, which I have never experienced. I thought maybe he was just adjusting, so I waited for him to return to normal and then tried another one a few days later. This time it made him had bloody stool, so I stopped and he returned to normal.
customer_reviews.author: JozaC16

customer_reviews.title: He won't eat red meat!  I'm confused! Lol
customer_reviews.text: Napoleon loves this! He's a Yorkie and such a picky eater. I'm trying everything to get him to eat. I tried the beef, turkey--which he hated almost as much as I hate turkey and the lamb. I'm going to keep trying to find ones that he will eat. I ordered pheasant. I will try venison and rabbit next. I like to have the option of rehydration--or not. I don't know how this was my rating! Napoleon actually will not eat this or the beef. I guess he's a poultry fan. He loves the duck the best, and then the pheasant. He won't eat turkey.
customer_reviews.author: TeriblteriTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: We love this product to add to our dogs food so ...
customer_reviews.text: We love this product to add to our dogs food so we ordered 2 bags from amazon and they both cane stale, they were not fresh and couldnt crumble easily. Will not buy again from amazon
customer_reviews.author: Tracy

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I got pricked when I was breaking it into a small piece to feed my puppy today. First I thought it was a bone or some kind of crops that has sharp edge. It hurt my finger. I wash it to find out what it was, it seems like some kind of fiber or something and it did not dissolve in the water. I want to trust these companies who makes dog food. I hope they are trustworthy. Not take advantage of innocent pets
customer_reviews.author: matth

customer_reviews.title: Sudden diarrhea, more itchy than usual
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been buying Stella turkey and lamb for awhile. My dog loves it, most days. She has some allergies, and is very hard to find food for a picky eater who has allergies. The turkey and lamb was great, good poop, less itching. However, on December 2019 bought a batch sold here, and my dog has just been having none stop diarrhea. I’m not sure if it is this batch, which someone also complained about sudden diarrhea around this time, or amazon or dog suddenly can’t eat this. But then reading the labels, 35% fat content. I’m going to stay away from Stella and chewy now.
customer_reviews.author: pikachoose

customer_reviews.title: Only dog food my dog will eat!
customer_reviews.text: When my dog was a pup, I struggled to find a food he would eat. I happened to go into a boutique style dog store and a Stella and Chewy's rep was handing out samples... she gave me several flavors to try.... My dog is now 9 and the ONLY food he will eat is the Stella and Chewy's Surf and Turf. He goes to the vet every three weeks to get groomed and the vet sees him....he is always healthy! Thank you for a great product.
customer_reviews.author: Dora D.

customer_reviews.title: Bone fragments, choking, not worth the cost
customer_reviews.text: It came packaged nicely and the package was full, not just half full like a lot of these dog treats. However my dog refused to eat these. She wouldn't even lick it after sniffing it. I tried giving them to her wet and dry. I offered to give the bag to a friend after my dog showed no interest but she called me and told me her dog had choked on a piece of bone fragment from one and she threw the rest away. Definitely won't be purchasing this or anything else from this line of dog food. Steer clear of this treat.
customer_reviews.author: Rosepetals

customer_reviews.title: Great Ingredients, Great Customers Service, Excellent Price
customer_reviews.text: I use this product for two small dogs. The company is very responsive to inquiries about sourcing of ingredients and any other questions I have. I have two of my fours dogs on this products (the large dogs are two big to eat it). My small dogs do very well on it with no upset stomachs ever. It's easy to transport when we go on trips and easy to store. They use all high quality ingredients and I will continue to purchase it.
customer_reviews.author: vunderstuff

customer_reviews.title: Too high in fat for most breeds
customer_reviews.text: This review is based upon using many flavors of Stella and Chewy’s Freeze Dried. I thought I had done my due diligence when searching for the best food for my Toy Fox Terrier. Unfortunately after being on this food for an extended period his triglyceride levels are through the roof. I didn’t realize it is insanely high in fat. We now have to try to get his fat levels down quickly which will be difficult in a toy breed. Frozen raw is less expensive and much lower in fat. Wish I would have known this tip before my dog developed health problems from eating freeze dried.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: THEY LOVE THE TASTE! Energy, health and happiness!!
customer_reviews.text: Our Yorkies can't eat even a trace of chicken/Turkey or grains, due to allergic reactions, these are without any. The main thing is we were having problems getting our dogs to bad at night, but now they tell us they want to go to bed and literally run into their bed crates so that they can have these treats. It is really crazy! We have not changed anything else except add these treats to their diet, but since we started giving it to them, our 2 sedentary older dogs have started acting like puppies again - smiling, wrestling and playing tug of war with all their toys. They definitely appear much happier with wagging his all he time.
customer_reviews.author: Solaris Lover

customer_reviews.title: Cats love this, too!
customer_reviews.text: Now, when I try to feed our dog without crumbling a few of these patties on top, Oscar looks at me with the most reproachful glare and won't touch his food. He adores these things. And so does our cat. We use them as treats, adding them to dry dog food and then adding enough water to make a horrible soupy concoction he slurps up without stopping. A terrific product. For the cat, we simply break off a tiny bit and offer it as an alternative to Temptations.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah Gardner Conta

customer_reviews.title: This is a TREAT for our dogs!
customer_reviews.text: We use this as a topper for our dogs and the pork and beef are their favorite flavors. One of the main reasons we tried Stellas was because a few years back there was a big deal on dog foods not supplying acceptable, well-rounded, nutrition when it came to the vitamin Taurine. I noticed these Stella products because they DO contain taurine and a bunch of other very important nutrients for that well-rounded nutrition for our little stinkers. We've been topping their meals with this for almost 3 years and the vet is very happy with their health. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Pro ShopperTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Made our dogs sick
customer_reviews.text: I had fed Stella and Chewy's years ago, but had to stop due to the expense and having 5 dogs. Recently I thought I would try again and give this food as a topper. I split one patty up between all 5 dogs after soaking in water which is not very much. I thought it would be the easiest way to transition them to the raw food. Even though I have been feeding other brands of raw to them for years. This is the only new item I have added to their diet and they all now have colitis.
customer_reviews.author: Leyna

customer_reviews.title: This food saved my dog.
customer_reviews.text: 3 years ago my dog was diagnosed with fanconi syndrome, wouldn't eat, weak and losing weight fast. Tried every kind of food that was recommended by vet but unsuccessful. Out of desperation I asked the clerk at my local pet store and this food was recommended as irresistible to all dogs. She started eating and hasn't stopped. She is still very thin but must be getting enough nutrition from this food to sustain her and the duck is very high in fat.
customer_reviews.author: P. Casey

customer_reviews.title: Puppy is a happy camper!
customer_reviews.text: This is my first time trying any raw or freeze dried puppy food; came the next day! tried it right away on 8 week Pit Bull who had gotten picky with kibble; gave her 2 patties; she loved it! gave her 2 more; she was in heaven; she kept licking the bowl & looking at me for more :))) she was so happy, hyped up, and very excited for a while after eating; I had not seen her so rambunctious; she has been loving it ever since; I am very happy with the balance of nutrients and the convenience of giving her raw this way; glad to be giving her something that will keep her healthy and happy
customer_reviews.author: jazzzbi

customer_reviews.title: inconsistent & poor quality
customer_reviews.text: This product is very inconsistent. After several purchases, we have noticed the quality has been degrading and the patties continue to change. This time around, the patties were extremely powdery with broken pieces and poorly shaped. The previous bag of patties were extremely stale and hard that they wouldn’t crumble, and had excessive amount of bone pieces and darker patties which I should’ve been more concerned. Our dogs are small Maltese and very sensitive and after feeding these for a couple weeks, they developed an increase in tears and indigestion. We can no longer trust these products to be safe for them.
customer_reviews.author: Son

customer_reviews.title: Rancid
customer_reviews.text: I have been buying Stella &Chewy for years and sometimes the patty is hard to chip and add water to soften but I usually manage. If I buy it from a store, it is softer and easier to rehydrate. I had ordered two bags from Amazon and by the time I opened the Rabbit, it was past the date I would have been able to return. This batch smelled rancid and was so tough to break up. I could not feed it to my precious baby and had to dump the whole bag. I tried twice but the smell from the bag was just too strange.
customer_reviews.author: Lori

customer_reviews.title: The product was destroyed in transit
customer_reviews.text: I have been purchasing this item for my dog for a long time. She is a very fussy eater but loves Stella and Chewy's Dinner Patties. Some of my recent orders had a few broken patties, a few pulverized. The shipment I received yesterday had no patties, all pulverized product. She will not eat this. This is a very expensive product that I am happy to pay for but I cannot waste $30. anymore. I hope that the manufacturer would consider different packaging.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Barry

customer_reviews.title: Good for your puppy treats!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered Chicken & Salmon first and love it. So I ordered "Beef & Salmon" with "Chicken & Salmon" again. It arrived today. This puppy treats are so good for Thor! I like to train Thor, but Thor swallow up usually. So this is the best for him. The price is not low, but the calories are low. haha.. You can also mix it with the dry food, very good :D Puppy life is important because they learn so fast! I would like to train him as much as I can. This food is help a lot! I also posted unboxing video! take a look Thank you and will order again!
customer_reviews.author: zizibe

customer_reviews.title: Rock hard (very unusual)
customer_reviews.text: Usually, every month in my subscription box these come very fresh and soft and appear to be in good quality! However this month they are hard as a rock and impossible to break up... quite disappointed with this and will be reconsidering my supplier next month.. 😠
customer_reviews.author: Jenn M.

customer_reviews.title: Did they change recipe for these?
customer_reviews.text: I've used these for a few years and my dog loved them. I signed up for auto delivery and they don't seem the same as the other .Most importantly, my dog does't like them. I have an unopened bag I can't return'
customer_reviews.author: camsnan

customer_reviews.title: Every dog loves this product!
customer_reviews.text: There are many dogs in my extended family, including a few who are such picky eaters that it has been a worry, since they often did not get enough nutrition in the past. This product solved the problem. Every dog in my family adores it, including the picky eaters, who never turn it down; so the worry about them not eating enough is gone. No matter if they turn everything else down, they never say no to this.
customer_reviews.author: VA

customer_reviews.title: Made my Dachshund so so sick!! My poor baby girl!
customer_reviews.text: This made my miniature Dachshund so sick. She had been eating Primal Foods and I decided to try her on Stella and Chewys. My poor baby threw up 2-3 times a day, everyday until I took her off of it and put her back on Primal, I would NOT suggest trying this Food, especially if you have a Dachshund! Maybe they just can't handle it, I'm not sure about other breeds but this stuff made my baby so so sick!!!
customer_reviews.author: GuidoLoko

customer_reviews.title: Quality means good nutrition
customer_reviews.text: Stella and Chewy has always provided a quality product. There are problems with some flavors and the bag arrives with nearly all pulverized bits. But that does not take away from the seller, maker or nutrition. I always get a good bag more times than not and simply add the bits to the rest. I always weigh the amount I feed my dog and break up the patties anyway. Not pulverize it, but good size chunks. Weighing is always the best way to insure the same amount per meal. I love this food and more importantly so does my dog. She's very healthy and I expect her to continue her great health because she gets quality food.
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: My picky dogs love these!
customer_reviews.text: I had a very picky, old dog who was having trouble with his appetite. We were trying everything to get him to eat anything other than a poorly made dog treat when a trainer recommended these. These are one of the few things he continued to eat. He LOVED them. I liked that I could either break them into bite sized chunks, or even crush them into a powder to put on his food easily. They are easily adaptable to food texture preferences, and all of my other dogs loved them too. If you have a picky eater, or just want to feed your dogs real ingredients and good food these are great!
customer_reviews.author: None

customer_reviews.title: Picky eater win!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my 6 pound feisty pup. This is by far her favorite food. Before I started buying this she would refuse to eat now this is the best part of her day. It’s a bit expensive but hey it’s good quality so you get what you pay for. I serve it both hydrated and dehydrated it just depends on her mood. Since she is a Morkie I also break it up in small pieces for her to chew. Chicken is her favorite.
customer_reviews.author: Hazel

customer_reviews.title: Trusted by Monkey Dogs loved by owner
customer_reviews.text: I’ve used Stella and chewy on and off, for my affenpinschers, for years now. I love the convenience and it makes it easier to feed when we’re on the road (dog shows, vacations, etc). I had an older one of my affens that suffer a medical issue and he became a swollen hazard and this food worked great. It doesn’t stick to his beard (like frozen food did & cause other infections if you cannot clean it right away), he absolutely loves to eat it and I trust the ingredients! Highly recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Harding House

customer_reviews.title: Quality pet food
customer_reviews.text: My dogs are picky eaters but love this brand and the beef flavor. I mix it (half/half) with dehydrated The Honest Kitchen food to help with the cost although they prefer only the freeze dried. I like the quality ingredients and feel good about feeding my 16 and 17 y/o dogs this brand. This batch must have been a little over processed because it was harder than normal. It sometimes has tiny, sharp bones so I break it up very small and pick them out.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: My cat really likes this stuff, even eats it straight fron the bag as a treat. And it's made from top-quality ingredients.
customer_reviews.text: I mainly feed my cat Primal Pet foods, which she likes. But she gets persnickety sometimes so I wanted to find another brand of freeze-dried BARF (bones & raw food) to offer her for variety. I don't give kitteh a daily multivitamin & Primal products don't contain added minerals (except Montmorillonite clay) or vitamins (except a small amount of Vit.E). So I checked out Stella & Chewy's ingredients & decided to try this because of the vitamins & minerals it contains. I've feed it to her twice this week so far & she likes it. She's always been partial to duck, but I'll definitely try their other proteins as well.
customer_reviews.author: RC

customer_reviews.title: Expensive, will cause spoiled dog...
customer_reviews.text: My spoiled pup likes these more than his treats (doggie cookies). I wish they came as little kibble nuggets like the Stella chewy cat food instead of patties so I can use them as treats for training. My 7 pound puppy eats 4 dry patties within like 30 seconds and he goes to the cat’s bowl and licks that clean then looks at me like I’m starving him. He really likes raw and freeze dried food (and fresh human food) and won’t touch brown dry kibble anymore. So be careful, you might spoil your dog feeding this stuff.
customer_reviews.author: Ketty

customer_reviews.title: Our cutie loves it but latest batch was problematic
customer_reviews.text: We have been buying the Goose Goose Duck for our lab cutie quite some time now. The latest one we ordered though did something to her and she would throw up her food everyday. We typically crumble half a patty in her meal twice a day. Stopped giving her the patty and she was normal. Resumed with half a patty and she was ok. Gave her half a patty twice a day and bam! the symptoms are back. We are thinking something is wrong with this batch and contacted Amazon for a replacement. Fingers crossed we get a good bag as she loves these patties!
customer_reviews.author: Alok S.

customer_reviews.title: Impressive
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product! Smells like the ingredients listed. My dog is a very fussy eater and she loves this. The only drawback is the price. I wish I could feed her more but I use it as a food topper over kibble. The freeze dried is so convenient. You can use it as a meal, treat or food topper. Also you can feed it dry or reconstitute with warm water. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Erin Leigh

customer_reviews.title: Great (Sometimes)
customer_reviews.text: 12/2018 - Great product. My senior dog (Jack Russel) is more active and trimmer since I started him (6 Weeks) on this food. It was shipped in a box (arrived intact) instead of a padded pouch (crumbles). Thank you amazon! Expensive, yes but, it works!! Update 07/15/2019 - Downgraded from 5 to 2 stars! This is the fourth order that I received that was hard as a brick. At $50 for 25 oz it should be easy to crumble !!
customer_reviews.author: Roger

customer_reviews.title: Great for picky eaters, very high-quality!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these on recommendation from a friend who feeds these to her two dogs. I have a new boxer puppy that is four months old and so far has been picky on eating. I crumble one Patty over his kibble and add about a teaspoon of warm water and mix it in. He eats every bit of his food now. Originally I thought it might be too expensive, however there are 76 patties in a bag (I counted 🤪) So one bag will last me over for a month. It’s very high-quality. My dog loves it, I would highly recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Kelsi Kaplan

customer_reviews.title: Puppies love it - bag doesn’t last long!
customer_reviews.text: My Boston puppies - ages 9 weeks & 11 weeks - love this food, and so does my 15 year old Boston! I crumble up a patty, each, into their dry kibble, and add a tablespoon of water to rehydrate. They devour this food, and it came highly recommended by my vet. The only downside to this product is that it is expensive & doesn’t last long, so I don’t know how realistic it will be to continue buying this food, as the two puppies grow & eat more.
customer_reviews.author: TwoDogSAHM

customer_reviews.title: Pricey But Worth It!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect complete for smaller dogs. None better - easier to handle/prepare than actual raw meat without sacrificing quality. I mix this (and the rabbit, turkey and chicken dinners interchangeable) with a high quality Canadian kibble (TLC Petfood) and my pup-pup loves it. You can even use the patties as then intermittent treat in between meals. Big fan despite the price. But if you use Subscribe and Save, if you buy the larger packages and use your Prime Card discounts, then you can save up to 20% each!
customer_reviews.author: L. Samuel

customer_reviews.title: Very Poor Quality!  Crumbs...$29 for a bag of crumbs X 4!
customer_reviews.text: My puppy LOVES this food! BUT, when I added it to my subscribe and save, I never would of imagined that they would put my laundry detergant in the same box as all my FREEZE DRIED FOOD!!! Hello! FREEZE DRIED means soft, easily pliable. I recieved 4 bags of crumbs.... Now, my puppy needs food she can chew AND I have no idea how to measure crumbs when the instructions they give you are in PATTIES!! BIG disappointment. Would be 5 star if they could figure out how to ship this food SEPARATLEY!!! Not rocket science people!
customer_reviews.author: LifeIsGood

customer_reviews.title: dog does not like
customer_reviews.text: 7 month old yorkie did not like. The puppy formula seemed more tasty - although a little stale, at least she would eat it. However switching form a different brand of raw freeze dried, this one she did not seem to be satisfied after eating it like the former brand ( which was more expensive). Thought the adult dog food it might satisfy her after she ate, more filling, that is the reason I purchased this brand second time. If I could return it I would.
customer_reviews.author: r everett

customer_reviews.title: Bad batch
customer_reviews.text: This current batch of duck patties for our dog was harder than the usual patties. We have been a customer for over a year now. We soon noticed that our dog became ill and started having soft stool which then turned to diarrhea. I removed the duck patties from her diet and her stool went back to normal. I even tried adding a smaller amount of the duck patty to her food but she continued to show soft stool again. We usually have no problem and our dog loves the dehydrated duck patties but we were unfortunate with a bad batch.
customer_reviews.author: Adam Crespo

customer_reviews.title: Mostly stale dust with 50% partial patties
customer_reviews.text: I have been buying Stella and chewys freeze dried patties for a long time, however this recent 25oz. bag of the Beef patties arrived as 45% dust and the rest broken partial patties. The exp date was exactly the same as my prior purchase but the quality was horrible- the partial patty pieces were terribly stale. Which is why it was mostly dust. The inconsistent quality is very concerning.
customer_reviews.author: loyal amzn customer

customer_reviews.title: Great, high quality food you can feel good about
customer_reviews.text: This line of food is all I feed my Cavapoo andHe loves it every time! I know they’re transparent when they have an issue (like when they couldn’t source the Venison), so I’ve come to trust the brand to tell me if there’s something wrong. We switch up the flavors each time, to keep it interesting. Recently, I’ve also tried their kibble just to have some flexibility in feeding (I don’t always have warm water at feeding time). The only issue I have is that sometimes, the bags I get from Amazon have arrived to my home a bit stale...
customer_reviews.author: Tej

customer_reviews.title: Stella & Chewy's
customer_reviews.text: I feed my dogs and cats from the same bag. They don't read labels so I can get away w it. Is there a bigger word than LOVE?!!! They would say that then, whatever that word would be. I just give them some, usually dry and snarf, they're looking up again for more! Any of these flavors, Duck Duck Goose is a favorite as well as the Chicken, Lamb and Beef are at the top of the list. I don't think there is a dog/cat out there who wouldn't get joyful over a mouthful of these! 'Try It, You'll Like It'!
customer_reviews.author: happygirl

customer_reviews.title: 🦃❤️New turkey flavor!! 🦃🙏🙌😁
customer_reviews.text: My pups ❤️ Stella & Chewy's freeze dried dinner patties and we're thrilled to get a new flavor. They love ALL things turkey🦃 so this was a definite hit. We've incorporated the new bag into our menu rotation as a permanent addition.👍🥰 You really can't go wrong with any of Stella & Chewy's raw diet.. Your pups will appreciate the tasty meal, & you will appreciate the health & tummy benefits.
customer_reviews.author: Bebe Blondell

customer_reviews.title: Yummy Duck, Small Amount, Best as Topper
customer_reviews.text: Mommy, we LOVES Stella and Chewey. Yes, the cat will try and steal a nibble, but Oliver eats his crumbled patties sooo fast, not a chance for a kitty steal. My dog weighs 14.6 pounds, but the bag is so tiny that the patties are best as a meal mixer on top of kibble. If I serve it alone, I add bone broth, and these patties dont soak up liquid super fast and get mushy. Oliver cant handle chicken but he does fine with duck. This is extremely expensive, so it ends up as a treat topper for kibble.
customer_reviews.author: Linda LeeTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Only if the zip lock works
customer_reviews.text: My dog is a picky eater and he loves this as toppings. I have bought a few bags and none came with a functioning zip lock. Even before I cut open the bag, I can tell the zipper and track are only on one side the bag, not on both sides. This is a most disappointing product defect. And it happens to every single one of my orders. I have to transfer the content to another container each time. Not good.
customer_reviews.author: Diane

customer_reviews.title: Good product but most of the patties were crushed in shipping.
customer_reviews.text: The product was fine but unfortunately about two thirds of the patties were crushed, making it difficult to geed the proper number of patties. I buy Stella and Chewy's all the time and I know the chicken patties are a little softer than the others, but I have never had the problem of the majority of the patties being crushed.
customer_reviews.author: F. Rowe

customer_reviews.title: Bad product feels like cardboard
customer_reviews.text: I used to buy this product before and it was nice and dry and will easily crumble on top of my dogs food, they changed it feels like cardboard you can’t crumble it and is hard to even shred it is just a horrible product I wouldn’t buy it my dog almost choke on it..
customer_reviews.author: Kyri

customer_reviews.title: Easy to feed, high quality food, but not affordable
customer_reviews.text: Great, high quality product, easy to give the dogs, but too pricey to realistically feed them on just this. As a Topper? Sure. But I couldn't justify the cost to feed my 2 Corgis entirely on this so I went back to Honest Kitchen. I didn't like that their serving recommendation was inconsistent (the bags servings differ from the serving calculator they have online). I followed the bag at first, so they were probably under fed. When I realized online was different, I emailed asking them why and they said I should follow online. Which means I have to feed them more, so a bag would only last me 2 days maybe...
customer_reviews.author: Yendolyn

customer_reviews.title: Stale product
customer_reviews.text: I've been ordering Stella and Chewys Surf 'N Turf freeze dried dinner patties for the past 5 years and my two pugs just love them mixed with their kibble. I have never had any complaint about the product until I opened the last bag. Although the product expiration is 9/25/2021, most of the patties inside this bag are stale and are very hard to break up. Not sure what happened to this bag and the guarantee says only good for refund or replacement within 14 days of purchase. I just happened to open the bag a month after receipt since I had a previous bag opened. Not sure if anything can be done.
customer_reviews.author: Tom Estok

customer_reviews.title: Doodle loves the food and is SO healthy!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely LOVE this product! I have a doodle puppy and I wanted to make sure he was getting enough protein/organs/bones, but not feed him plain raw food (not recommended by multiple vets at our clinic) and this did the trick. His coat is beautiful, he is growing very fast and his poop is solid and consistant. I HIGHLY recommend Stella and Chewys to anyone who has a dog!!! We put other Stella and Chewys food with these (topper and one or two other meats they have) and it’s perfect for our dog!!
customer_reviews.author: Elia Zanella

customer_reviews.title: Reformulated and reduced weight from 15 oz to 14 oz but no change to Amazon ad!
customer_reviews.text: Have loved and used this product with my dog for 3 years. Just re-ordered from Amazon this past week and apparently reformulated without changing the advertising! Now 14 oz instead of 15 oz, even though says 15 oz AND the nutrient proportions are different as well. Canceled my subscribe & save and plan to call the company to find out what has changed and why.
customer_reviews.author: Adam Sheck

customer_reviews.title: Don't Buy Stella & Chewy's Online-Not Fresh
customer_reviews.text: Stella & Chewy's is a great dog food but every time I order it online, the product delivered is not fresh; the freezed dried patties are hard. When I buy at my local pet store, the patties are fresh. What is more important, my dog doesn't seem to like the online- order stale hard patties. I won't buy online again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: WAY OVERPRICED!  BUY LOCALLY IF YOU CAN.
customer_reviews.text: THE PRODUCT ITSELF IS VERY VERY GOOD. I BOUGHT A BAG AT MY VET FOR $15 AND MY DOG LOVED IT - AND MY CAT BEGGED FOR SOME TOO ;) HOWEVER, WHEN I BOUGHT ON THIS SITE I THOUGHT I WAS GETTING THE LARGER BAG - I SHOULD HAVE PAID ATTENTION MORE. I FEEL LIKE I GOT RIPPED OFF - $24 FOR THE SAME SIZE I PAID $15 AT THE VET. NEVER AGAIN. I WILL BUT THIS LOCALLY.
customer_reviews.author: Leonora A. Perry

customer_reviews.title: Way to hard to break up! Hockey pucks!!
customer_reviews.text: These have lost quality drastically. They started out being nice and soft and now they are made extremely hard. Makes it very difficult to break up and soften for my dogs to eat them. Why would you change the formula that was working?!
customer_reviews.author: Squarebuilder

customer_reviews.title: Super stale!
customer_reviews.text: I received three bags in a row, each bag was more stale and rock hard than the last. These bags mustve been sitting on their shelves for a long time. There was no moisture left in the chicken patties. My dog, who is SUPER PICKY, refuses to eat them when I add water. I have always given them to him dry and had no problem until now.
customer_reviews.author: Bloop Bleep

customer_reviews.title: Much better than just dry or wet food
customer_reviews.text: Been feeding our Maltipoo since he was a puppy a mixture of good quality dry foot supplemented with Stella & Chewey's. He loves the patties which we break up into smaller pieces for the little guy. Most of the time the patties are very flaky, but sometimes they are hard as a rock. That's the only reason I gave freshness 4 stars instead of 5
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Morgan

customer_reviews.title: Arrived with ants all over them!
customer_reviews.text: I wish I could say that my dog liked or disliked the food. The problem was, when I opened the box, ants were all in the inside. The reason, there was a slit on the side of the bag so in the garbage that went. Accidents do happen and after the COVID19 I am thankful we even have workers attempting to work for all of us!
customer_reviews.author: Sashagirl

customer_reviews.title: My Dog Likes!
customer_reviews.text: My dog enjoy's Stella & Chewy's Chicken Freeze-Dried Dinner Patties very much. Has been eating them for quite awhile. My problem with them is he only likes the patties that are whole. Why is this a problem, you ask. Well, almost 2/3 of the patties are crumbs by the time they arrive. Thus, there is a lot of waste. That is not good. But they do make my dog a happy puppy. But the waste does not make me happy.
customer_reviews.author: Loves to Read

customer_reviews.title: food no good
customer_reviews.text: customer service no good in helping to choose bag food due to their recommendations with several different orders made not one bag was soft or semi soft i purchased the most nasty food they must have its all about money not taking care of customers needs and they took plenty of my money for wrong food recommendations food no good freeze dried is nasty no thank you chewy
customer_reviews.author: peggy gregory

customer_reviews.title: Good Food, Inadequate packaging
customer_reviews.text: My two Havenese really like the food and it seems so healthy as their poops are smaller than average and they've not increased their body weight. However, about half the chicken patties are in pieces and pulverized. This makes it difficult to apportion the food to my two dogs. I can see nothing out of place in the Amazon box or the heavy coated paper. Nevertheless, something ought to be done because a good product poorly dilivered ought to have a fix.
customer_reviews.author: Jake Schor

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed with this month’s batch - contained some inedible patties
customer_reviews.text: Usually very pleased with this product. However, this month’s batch contained several patties that were rock hard, dark color line through interior and virtually impossible to break up. Had to leave in water for at least 10 mins to soften up, and then my dog wouldn’t eat them..... I would say at least 8-10 of these “faulty” patties in this month’s bag ☹️ Have included piks of usual patty vs faulty together in left picture. The usual patty is on left, vs abnormal patty in right. The second picture is a close up of the abnormal patty with dark line running through.
customer_reviews.author: JDC

customer_reviews.title: FINALLY A PRODUCT MY LITTLE FOG LOVES
customer_reviews.text: FINALLY found food my little dog LOVES. I have been so tired of throwing away food he would not eat. He is so picky. Yes, this is more expensive but cheaper than what I have thrown away and no more guilt when I had to listen to his stomach growling at night and would still refuse to eat. He actually wanted more. Great flavor and product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not fresh
customer_reviews.text: I live this brand and it’s the only thing my dog will eat. But this the second time I have order it online and both times it was old like. These are usually really easy to tear apart and are not hard but the ones I order online were not fresh at all not soft and not easy to tear apart. Will not order online again.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Carman

customer_reviews.title: My picky dog loves it! Turkey and Duck!
customer_reviews.text: My half Pomeranian half Chihuahua dog is very picky. I go back and forth between the duck and the turkey. He loves them both! He was not a fan of the lamb or the surf and turf. But eats up the other 2! These always come fresh and never stale. It took forever for me to find food he would eat on a regular basis for his diet. The only meal he will eat! Worth the money and headache for those picky eaters!
customer_reviews.author: Ed

customer_reviews.title: barely any solid patties, mostly crumbs
customer_reviews.text: Disappointed with my recent large bag of chicken patties. it was mostly crumbs and very dry. when the product is measured per patty and it’s just dust how can we feed our pets accurately.
customer_reviews.author: Mickey Dee

customer_reviews.title: Notmally these are great, but the pkg i received was 100% stale
customer_reviews.text: My dog absolutely loves these... and she's a very picky eater. Usually each patty is fairly easy to crumble over dry dog food. Unfortunately, the bag we received was stale... every patty was hard as a rock. Dog still ate it, but it took forever to break up! Will probably just continue to buy these at my local pet store because you can feel how fresh they are through the bag.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren Ruddock

customer_reviews.title: Dogs new favorite
customer_reviews.text: Dog refuses other previously favorite treats and waits for these. We are out and the look I am getting while trying to use up the other stuff is a bit reminiscent of a hungry orphan being denied dinner. Stocking up next time
customer_reviews.author: J M P

customer_reviews.title: Bad handling and packing
customer_reviews.text: I have been feeding Stella & Chewy for a long (10 years +) time to my Bichon. The food is great but Amazon handling and packing leaves a lot to be desired. Last batch came in a powder state as with no patties intact. Amazon needs to take a little more care. Box that bags came in was not damaged so can’t blame USPS this time.
customer_reviews.author: tr47

customer_reviews.title: The dinner patties are hard as bricks!!!
customer_reviews.text: My yorkie loves Stella &Chewy freeze dried dinner patties. I'm not sure why but the patties in last 3 orders are so hard I have to out them in a coffee grinder to break them up. I'm going to switch Stella & Chewy products.
customer_reviews.author: Darlene Dykes

customer_reviews.title: Duck Patties Rock
customer_reviews.text: Our rescue dog has had trouble eating and gaining weight (8-10 less than healthy suggested weight). Starting him on Stella freeze dried patties has helped stimulate his appetite. We serve the patties according to weight class and leave a bowl of regular dried food along side too. The Duck patties have a good texture and a mild smell. The patties ship pretty much intact.
customer_reviews.author: Ginny M

customer_reviews.title: Last two bags sent to me through Amazon are as hard as cement!
customer_reviews.text: This is a replacement bag from the last bag I got. The patties are as hatd as Rocks! I cant break them down for my dig because they are like cement. I’ve never had this problem with Stella and Chewys and might have to go back to purchasing them from my local pet store.
customer_reviews.author: Ripe Reviews

customer_reviews.title: Expired Treats!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these at the recommendation from my dog trainer because my dogs loved them when he treated them with some. Then I bought some at a store near me and they were great. Since I always shop on Amazon, I decided to order some here and they are EXPIRED! These should be light and delicate but instead they are hard, heavy and dry! It is bad enough to pay almost $30 for dog treats but then to have them expired is just plain awful. Do not buy these online.
customer_reviews.author: Liz

customer_reviews.title: Tend To Crumble and Shred Before Arrival
customer_reviews.text: The dogs like these, but for some reason the pieces arrive mostly shredded up - they don't keep their shape like the beef, lamb and other items offered by Stella & Chewy's. If you break them up anyway, that doesn't matter. I 'hide' them for the dogs to find, so I like having a single larger piece for them to find, rather than crumbles and shreds.
customer_reviews.author: IthacaNancy

customer_reviews.title: Pure, nutritional, delicious "treat" that dogs love. Great for dogs with allergies!
customer_reviews.text: This is as pure as you can get for dog food or treats. It's rabbit, with the insides and bones, too, ground up and freeze dried. It can be used as their diet or as a treat. My dogs adore it as a treat and I feel satisfied that they're being nourished and getting no junk at all in the process. I have one dog who is not a good eater, but she'll eat these and I know they are a good substitute for her food, so that's a double reason for having them on hand as "treats". Best stuff ever!
customer_reviews.author: monikerlewinsky

customer_reviews.title: Vet recommends them as treats rather than meals.
customer_reviews.text: My puppy loved these but the vet advised that we get something with grains with extra nutrients that a puppy needs to grow properly. We still use them for treats.
customer_reviews.author: Homeschoolmommaof4

customer_reviews.title: Seems like a great product but not shipped well
customer_reviews.text: I would love to rate this product amazingly based on everything I’ve heard. Unfortunately, when the product arrived, all the patties were completely smashed... they weren’t patties anymore just a bag of crumbs. I think this is due to the amazon packaging it was shipped in, but it was a little bit of a bummer. Just a heads up, while salmon is great for dogs, the salmon and chicken for puppies does smell a lot like salmon. Overall though, I think the brand and products are great, the Stella and Chewys packaging itself was nice quality, and our little pup LOVED it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love this product and I always buy it from my ...
customer_reviews.text: I love this product and I always buy it from my local pet store but this time I bought it on amazon and it wasn't the same. First my dog noticed cause he wasn't eating it. The patties were Definitely drier than The ones I had before and then I noticed the scent was different. Harder to break. Maybe they absorbed moisture in their storage. I suggest buying it from pet store.
customer_reviews.author: P

customer_reviews.title: Either Stale or Horrible New Recipe
customer_reviews.text: These things are hard as a rock. I have to us a knife to cut and my wife hurt herself in the process. Old ones used to crumble easily. Returning and recommend not buying these again to anyone reading this review
customer_reviews.author: Terry

customer_reviews.title: Of all the freeze dried raw food products, this is my dog's absolute favourite!
customer_reviews.text: Of all the freeze dried raw food products, this is my dog's absolute favourite! I only gave 4 stars because of the price. It is also very expensive compared to other brands. I wish I could afford to purchase it regularly (and my dog would agree) but sadly it is not doable. Great product though!
customer_reviews.author: M. Liga

customer_reviews.title: Wow.  This is the best!
customer_reviews.text: After struggling for years to get my Silkie Terrier to eat well, I finally found freeze dried beef. I've never seen him clean the bowl before. Then I tried Freeze Dried Beef from Stella & Chewy's because I had read their products were so healthy. I have a brand new dog. My Silkie is actually SILKY. Of course, my grooming charges will now go up, but he looks so healthy. Read the list of ingredients. Freeze dried is not cheap, but we don't waste any of it.
customer_reviews.author: South Florida

customer_reviews.title: Sharp bone fragments? No thanks!
customer_reviews.text: My chihuahua just inhaled this food but after reading about recalls and sharp bone fragments I'M VERY hesitant to buy this again. I see no comments from the manufacturer on any of these posts concerning the sharp bones people are finding which can be extremely dangerious to your dog!!!. Instead of mixing with water, i made a tea with oat straw and dandelion tea and used that as the liquid. Expensive food but its all down the hatch!
customer_reviews.author: Betty

customer_reviews.title: Product not intact
customer_reviews.text: Item arrived quickly, however, only half of the patties were intact. The rest were completely smashed and in tiny pieces. In that state, it is difficult to know if you are giving your pet the correct amount. My dog likes the taste and I know it is good for her. Just wish it had come as advertised - in patties.
customer_reviews.author: Marilyn

customer_reviews.title: Amazing raw dog food
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love Stella and chewy. All of my dogs and cats lick their bowls clean every time, and beg for more! The company is amazing and actually cares about customers, the animals and what goes into the food. You definitely won't be disappointed. They have a wide variety of foods, different flavors for dogs and cats alike.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer L.

customer_reviews.title: Product arrived crumbled.
customer_reviews.text: There were only a few unbroken patties inside this order. Otherwise the contents were crumbs. It must have been crushed prior to shipping because other items in same shipment were not damaged in any way. The reason I buy these is for the portion control when my dog is with the sitter. She gets her measure of dry food plus one reconstituted patty.
customer_reviews.author: Pauline

customer_reviews.title: The Dog Food
customer_reviews.text: My 2 toy poodles are very spoiled (my fault). They extremely choosy what they eat, but this Stella & Chewy's patties they absolutely LOVE. I didn't find any negative sides for this food, except price. I mix 1/3 of the Stella's food with 2/3 can food or dry food, dogs love it.
customer_reviews.author: Marcey

customer_reviews.title: GSD Approved!! :)
customer_reviews.text: My German Shepherd loves Stella & Chewy's Freeze Dried Patties .... this is our first time trying the Duck variety, but it went over without a hitch.... 2 paws up :) There was a bit of crumble in the bag... probably the equivalent of 2 to 3 patties that had broken up.... not a big deal really, as they are still useable. I reserved the crumbles in a ziplock baggie and will use as a topper with other raw meat or fish and steamed veggies at mealtime...my girl will enjoy them just the same....still a 5 star review & product either way!
customer_reviews.author: GSDGirl1

customer_reviews.title: Great addition to kibble for picky dogs
customer_reviews.text: My golden doodle is a very fussy eater. I usually have to enhance his dry dog food to get him to eat. One of these raw patties soaked in hot water and then mixed into his food is all it takes to get him to gobble up his entire bowl. He starts wagging his tail when I reach for the bag.
customer_reviews.author: Natalie

customer_reviews.title: My dogs love Stella and Chewy's
customer_reviews.text: My dogs can be a bit picky, but they never turn their noses up to Stella and Chewy's. I've tried several kinds, but usually prefer the Chicken as it crumbles easier. I have only tried the chicken and beef so far, though. I feel like the ingredients are good quality for packaged dog food. It's a bit pricey, but my dogs are my family.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Sheets

customer_reviews.title: my dogs love stella and chewys!!!!
customer_reviews.text: STELLA AND CHEWYS Has all the important ingredients like Taurine for heart health and organs plus no fillers that can make your dog ill we only feed Stella and Chewys btw the new digestive kibble is awesome too . Prebiotics are just as important as probiotics We just add a few freeze dried minnow fish for omegas 3s. Voila perfect. Happy healthy dogs. Always read the ingredients do not trust labels!
customer_reviews.author: Charlotte

customer_reviews.title: can give in small pieces
customer_reviews.text: we have a 13 y/o lab. Not eating too well. We use these stella as treats between meals. We break off pieces to entice her and add to it as she starts to eat. . She then has some water to drink. Expensive, but desperate situation when your pet won't eat. They have a long shelf life, and are nutritious.
customer_reviews.author: J. D. Ruiz

customer_reviews.title: BEST DOG FOOD I HAVE FOUND THAT THEY LOVE
customer_reviews.text: I don't understand all the negative reviews about the dandy lamb dinner it is one of the best of a five star dog food. i have feed my two toy poodles this food since a few months old and they love it along with beef and duck. I break up each patties before i serve it and have never found anything wrong with the food. If you feed raw S&C dog food you will use less of this per serving. The bag said 3.5 patties a day and i found that two and a half maintained their weight and keep them happy. Of course they would eat as much as i would put down because they love it...
customer_reviews.author: Buck deal

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed customer.
customer_reviews.text: I have been giving my Lady these for several months and she has been very satisfied but the last package I received was very dry and the texture was to me over dried. The package writing said best before Aug. 2021. I think it should have read before Aug. 2020.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Stella & Chewy's Freeze-Dried Raw Dinner Patties
product_meta.description:
Flavor Name:Beef| Size:14 ozEvery pet parent wants wholesome, natural nutrition for their pet. Stella & Chewy's raw diets focus on pure ingredients and raw protein so you can feed them as nature intended.

At Stella & Chewy's we believe that pure raw nutrition fed in its natural state is the best way to help your pet thrive. Our limited ingredient recipes are simple and pure. Each batch starts with 85% or more meat, organs and bone and is often a single source of animal protein, the perfect solution for pets with food sensitivities. 

Each protein is grass-fed, cage-free or wild caught to guarantee your pet is eating as nature intended. All of the produce in our recipes are 100% organic certified, grown by farmers we trust. Our all-natural recipes are crafted with care in our own USA kitchen to provide the highest levels of protein rich meat and quality grain-free nutrition for your pet, as if they were in the wild.

In the Stella & Chewy's kitchen, we take time to craft each recipe in small batches from the world's finest ingredients. All of our ingredients are responsibly sourced.
feature_bullets: Only the good stuff! Dogs naturally crave meat, much like they ate in the wild. That's why every batch of Stella’s Super Beef Dinner Patties starts with 95% beef (always grass-fed!), organs and bone plus 100% organic certified fruits and vegetables to guarantee your pet is eating as nature intended. All ingredients are responsibly sourced.

Made in the USA - Stella’s Super Beef Dinner Patties’ all-natural recipe is crafted with care in small batches in Stella & Chewy’s own USA kitchen to provide the highest levels of protein-rich meat and quality grain-free nutrition for your pet

Minimally processed and all natural. Because the closer foods stay to their natural state, the better they are. That's why each of Stella & Chewy's recipes contains added taurine and no added hormones, antibiotics, grains or fillers. Best of all, it's 100% complete and balanced for all life stages
Raw nutrition and convenience - your pet deserves to thrive on real, raw meat. Now, Stella & Chewy's makes it easier than ever to give your pet real raw nutrition with the convenience of freeze-dried

Supports better health for your pet with improved appetite and digestion, relief from allergies, vibrant skin and coat, healthy teeth and gums, greater stamina and vitality and a healthy immune system
100% SATISFACTION GUARANTEE on "Ships from and sold by Amazon" items. Questions? Contact Stella & Chewy's at 888-477-8977

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Currently, item can be shipped only within the U.S. and to APO/FPO addresses. For APO/FPO shipments, please check with the manufacturer regarding warranty and support issues.
specifications.International Shipping: This item is not eligible for international shipping.

Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
